xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" cdata-section-elements="line" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:apply-templates select="@*|node()" /> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="line"> <xsl:copy> <xsl:call-template name="replace-non-ascii"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="." /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:copy> </xsl:template> <xsl:template name="replace-non-ascii"> <xsl:param name="text" /> <xsl:variable name="ascii"> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no"> !"#$%&amp;'()*+,-./0123456789:;=<>?@ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ[]^_`abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz{|}~</xsl:text> </xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="non-ascii" select="translate($text, $ascii, '')" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="$non-ascii"> <xsl:variable name="char" select="substring($non-ascii, 1, 1)" /> <xsl:call-template name="replace-non-ascii"> <xsl:with-param name="text" select="translate($text, $char, ' ')" /> </xsl:call-template> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <xsl:value-of select="$text" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
Remove non-ascii characters like Ã¢<80><98> which is non-ascii representation of single-quote.
Note the content is coming from an adapter where each line is in a "line" element like: <response> <line>kjhdsd</line> <line>pojklj</line> </response>
